hero.title: Enterprise Audit Management System
hero.subtitle: Kurumsal denetim yönetim sistemi
hero.description: Enterprise-grade audit management system with advanced workflow engine, 4-layer RBAC, and comprehensive CAPA tracking. ISO compliant, production-ready.

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need for enterprise audit processes

list.title: Audit Management
list.description: Template-based audits, scoring & risk assessment. Comprehensive audit templates and automatic score calculation.

list.title: Finding Tracking
list.description: Finding management with severity classification. Criticality-based finding management and tracking system.

list.title: CAPA Workflows
list.description: Simple actions & 8-step DOF process (ISO compliant). Simple actions and ISO-compliant 8-step DOF process.

list.title: 4-Layer RBAC
list.description: Admin bypass, role-based, workflow-based, ownership-based permissions. Multi-layered secure authorization system.

list.title: Workflow Engine
list.description: Visual builder with auto-assignment strategies. Visual workflow designer and automatic assignment strategies.

list.title: Real-time Dashboard
list.description: Task tracking and analytics. Real-time task tracking and analytical reporting.

list.title: Smart Notifications
list.description: Email alerts and deadline monitoring. Smart notifications and deadline tracking system.

list.title: Multi-language
list.description: Turkish & English support. Full Turkish and English language support.

architecture.title: System Architecture
architecture.subtitle: Layered structure following Clean Architecture principles

layers.title: Frontend Layer
layers.description: Next.js 15 + React + TypeScript + shadcn/ui. Server Components and Client Components.

layers.title: Permission Layer
layers.description: Unified permission checker. 4-layer model: Admin bypass, Role-based, Workflow-based, Ownership-based.

layers.title: Database Layer
layers.description: PostgreSQL + Drizzle ORM. Users, Roles, Permissions, Workflows, Audits, Findings, Actions, DOFs.
